tools.name: get_logs
tools.description: Find all ComfyUI installations and their log files on the system

tools.description: Find and analyze errors in a ComfyUI log file with optional time filtering

tools.description: Monitor and display the last lines of a ComfyUI log file in real-time

tools.name: find_workflow_by_id

log_retention_days.title: Log Retention Days
log_retention_days.description: Number of days to retain log analysis history
